#OneSquareOne - one team, many talents

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You are about to join a group of talented and savvy JavaScript Developers to build well-designed, user-centered apps for our foreign clients.
You‚Äôre excited about working closely with Product Designers, Backend Developers, Scrum Masters and QAs (they are your new best friends now!).
Developing complex products in an ‚ÄúA-Z manner‚Äù is what you desire (we‚Äôre not code-monkeys!). You are willing to propose outcomes apart from just implementing them.
Agile, scrum & lean startup are not just buzzwords ‚Äì no project managers, a scrum master in every team, and iterative product delivery are standard at Boldare.
Code review and using best practices (TDD, BDD etc.) are the habits you cannot live without.
Self-organization ‚Äì there are no managers in Boldare, so the teams organize their work by themselves. You‚Äôll be engaged in building the product roadmap, sprint planning, etc.
Direct impact on the product & tech stack ‚Äì our scrum teams are responsible not only for performing tasks but also for proposing technical solutions. You‚Äôre the expert here, so we trust in your tech recommendations.
Clients are partners ‚Äì we really care about our relationships with them, and we cooperate as equal partners. There will be no proxies in between your team and the client. Forget about waiting ages for the answer to a simple question - you can expect clear and direct communications.
Face-to-face meetings with clients and the team (which are highly valuable for us). Regular business trips are standard at Boldare. With some partners we meet once a month, with others every six months. The frequency varies, but we care for all team members to participate in onsite meetings.
Transparency and feedback. We always share the results of our work and give each other feedback. Everybody here has full access to data (including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data). Also, we communicate via open channels to effectively spread information.
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats.

Biannual Company Celebrations: twice a year, we bring everyone together for a company-wide event. It‚Äôs a great opportunity to unwind and have fun with your coworkers
Anniversary Celebrations: we‚Äôre grateful to have you with us, and we make sure to celebrate every year you‚Äôre here. Reach the 10-year milestone, and you‚Äôll receive a special gift to mark the occasion
Pet-Friendly Office: love bringing your furry friend to work? Our office is pet-friendly, so your four-legged companion is always welcome
Tech Choice: you can choose between a MacBook or a Lenovo laptop, depending on your preference

Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats
The possibility of hybrid mode. You can work from home, but still, our teams meet regularly at Boldare office and we will need you in the office once a week

description_block:
Boldare
Scroll to company's profile
Boldare is an Agile-powered company with nearly two decades of international experience in product development and consulting. The company helps clients redefine their industries by building with them the products their users want. Starting in 2004, Boldare now has talents spread across Europe. They have built over 300 digital products for clients around the globe ‚Äì Western and North Europe, the United Kingdom, North America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Australia.
additional_module_section:
What does working in Boldare taste like?
Feedback always & everywhere - We are always ready and open to share our thoughts! We do it in our daily work, workshops, 1:1 sessions, etc. This is one of the best tools in our professional growth. We also often share feedback in a team forum, because it‚Äôs great to learn from each other‚Äôs experiences.
Transparency in our DNA - EVERYBODY in Boldare has full access to data, including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data, etc. We almost always communicate with each other via open channels to effectively spread information. This is what you need to make conscious, independent decisions in your role

employer_name: Flying Bisons sp. z o.o.About the company
responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
The Flying Digital Content is a part of Flying Bisons Group, specialising in photo and video content production. We collaborate with well-known brands such as HBO Max, Sizeer, 50style, Space Range, My To Sukces, and Glo. Do you know artists like Mata, Kizo, Bia≈Ças, Sok√≥≈Ç, Malik Montana, and Pezet? If your answer is yes, you probably could see our video productions! The portfolio of our clients is getting bigger, and our team of A-players, too!
We're building a curated network of talented freelance Angular Developers that we can call upon for existing and future projects. When you apply to join our freelancer base, you will be evaluated and kept on file. You may not be contacted immediately. When a project matches your specific expertise, you‚Äôll be invited to participate and can choose to accept or decline based on your availability. If you're interested in becoming part of our talent pool, please submit your CV. We‚Äôll get in touch as soon as an opportunity aligned with your skills arises.
Are you self-driven, and dependable professional? If so, we look forward to hearing from you!
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of commercial experience in Angular development (experience with or a minimum working knowledge of Angular 19)
Proficiency in RxJS and the ability to effectively use reactive programming patterns
Experience with Angular Material or other component libraries
Knowledge of TypeScript, HTML, and CSS (Sass)
Familiarity with Git version control system
Very good command of Polish and English
Optional
Experience with Nx or similar tools
Knowledge of Tailwind CSS
Hands-on experience with Signals and their practical usage
Experience with state management libraries such as NgRx (Signal Store), Akita, or other Redux-based tools
Understanding of WCAG standards and ability to implement accessibility guidelines
Familiarity with Storybook and experience in building and managing Design Systems
description_block:
Flying Bisons sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Flying Bisons is a leading Digital Consulting & Delivery company based in the heart of Europe, Warsaw. Our mission is to help our clients to Unleash Digital Potential‚Ñ¢. We discover, define, design, and develop world-class digital products that drive business results for our clients, shaping digital experiences for millions of people around the world.
We stand out due to our end-to-end process that allows us to approach each and every challenge with confidence that we can deliver the best results. Our expertise includes Research, Digital Strategy, Branding, Content (Written, Photos, Videos), Product Design, Web & Mobile Development, Data Analytics & AI.
Join our 120-people team to co-create industry-defining products and heart-racing experiences for the biggest brands (Mercedes AMG, IKEA, KFC, eObuwie, ≈ªabka, Sanofi, Zain) and disruptive startups (like Booksy, Nethone, Telemedi, or DevSkiller)!
additional_module_section:
Why work with us?
Unleash Your Potential: We don't just encourage growth; we're your partners! Our feedback culture is as regular as your morning coffee.
Routine feedback meetings, feedback workshops, and a well-defined career path ensure a transparent way for continuous development.
Elevate with Flying Spirit: We value a flat structure, allowing you to work directly with experts and report to leaders who are hands-on in projects.
Here, synergetic teamwork is the way we thrive.
Knowledge-sharing meetups, consultations with managers, regular team integrations, and a culture of support are how we roll to provide an environment where you want to grow.
Thriving Partnerships, Boundless Opportunities: With diverse clients and a team, our work is beyond borders.
Whether your location is Poland or Saudi Arabia, you might work for special projects in another country or integrate and network with industry specialists.
Our people: Check our Instagram or YouTube channel to see who the Bisons are!

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You‚Äôll work on an innovative project for a Fortune 500 retail giant the application that serves as a powerful data aggregator, pulling information from various systems into one unified platform. The real charm of this application is in it‚Äôs automation capabilities. It streamlines numerous business steps, enabling what would typically take several weeks to be completed within an hour. By presenting data in a visually appealing and readable manner, it significantly enhances user experience and simplifies business decision-making.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript and NodeJS ‚Äì with 3+ years under your belt, you‚Äôre ready to conquer!
Practical knowledge of NPM, ExpressJS, and REST API‚Äôs ‚Äì these are your bread and butter.
Experience with Mongoose, MongoDB, Jest, and Swagger ‚Äì you know your way around these tools.
Comfortable with GIT and Agile/SCRUM methodologies ‚Äì teamwork and version control are second nature to you.
Optional
React, fullstack experience.
Experience in TDD ‚Äì if you‚Äôre adept at this, it‚Äôs time to stand out!
Familiarity with Microservices, oAuth 2.0, and JWT ‚Äì if you‚Äôve got it, flaunt it!
Azure and Azure DevOps services ‚Äì these are your secret weapons.
offered_section:
What we offer
BENEFITS: Regardless of the form of employment - Budget for your professional development - training and certification. MyBenefit cafeteria (with Multisport). Medicover medical care. Team-building meetings and trips.
FLEXIBILITY: Enjoy the freedom of working from anywhere, and have a genuine say on our tools, tech, and solutions.
STABILITY: Stable and long-term employment (employment contract, B2B).
START-UP CULTURE: Open communication, creative problem solving and a flat hierarchy.
GROWTH: Skyrocket your career by exploring new territories ‚Äì you can work on various projects related to Big Data and Cloud.
COLLABORATION: Be part of our diverse, passionate team, where every voice matters. Work in a company full of well-coordinated people who do their work with passion and commitment.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You'll implement backends and their interactions with various data stores and other APIs (including 3rd party APIs).
You'll work in an agile environment focusing on projects that are impactful on our business.
You'll support reliable databases and APIs for real-time automated decision-making.
You‚Äôll work in an agile environment focusing on projects that are impactful.
You'll deploy your software using industry-standard tooling like Kubernetes clusters, and Lambda functions.
You'll care deeply about security in everything you do and constantly raise the baseline of how we defend our user's data against external threats and themselves.
You'll implement robust automated test suites to ensure high quality and low failure rate of delivered code.
You'll work in a DevOps style to make sure Defense in Depth principles are followed and containers are as secure as humanly possible.
You‚Äôll have a lot of chances to develop your programming skills as well as learn a lot about how tech business is done in the US (if you want to).

Can engage in discussions and decisions regarding software design and architecture.
Have experience implementing the test pyramid (unit, integration, e2e tests).

Have a good command of English (written & spoken).

description_block:
Swing Development
Scroll to company's profile
SwingDev‚Äîa hippo company is the Polish branch of a fast-growing InsurTech product company ‚Äì Hippo Insurance. We‚Äôre here to make home insurance smarter and more proactive, using tech to bring fresh solutions. We also create digital products that support our customers, always focusing on what really makes an impact.
Putting a lot of effort into hiring top-tier devs, designers, PMs, and QAs, is a proof that we care a lot about tech experience, the attitude, human approach, and what we could call ‚Äûculture fit‚Äù.
‚ÄûSwingDev is all about people‚Äù - yes, it may sound a bit cliche. But whether we're writing code or just hanging out, we know that people are at the heart of everything we do. We like to have a good time and keep things light, even when we're tackling big projects. We could brag about what‚Äôs making us special, but we‚Äôve boiled it down to two key ingredients: mature, companionable people who, rather than compete, prefer to inspire and have each other‚Äôs backs; a culture of trust, empathy, and positivity that keeps us together, lets us interact as teammates and friends, and truly enjoy the ride.

description_block:
Maxima Europe Sp. z.o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Global challenges and evolving customer demands call for global talent strategies and international teams. This is why all major companies and many SMEs work with IT outsourcing and consultancy partners such as Maxima Consulting. Our technology consultants utilize their knowledge and skills to become trusted advisors to clients in multiple industries. They deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to client‚Äôs individual business needs, support and coach their in-house IT teams, and champion innovation.
Maxima Consulting is proud to be a people-centric organization where all employees are valued and recognized as a leading company strength. We are a team of long-term thinkers focused on sustainability and growth and have a track record of long-lasting partnerships with our clients and consultants alike. You are welcome here regardless of your gender, religion, location, age, and any other personal characteristics.
additional_module_section:
Recruitment process flow
We respect your time and effort, so our recruitment process is as short and convenient as possible. Our recruiters are committed to keeping you in the loop and will happily answer your questions to help you prepare or clarify our expectations.
1. You apply for a job.
2. We review your profile to ensure you‚Äôre going for an opening that suits you best.
3. You meet our recruiter online for an introductory interview.
4. You meet your future team members for an interview so you can demonstrate your skills.
5. You receive a job offer. Welcome aboard!

At The Stepstone Group, we have a simple yet very important mission: The right job for everyone. Using our data, platform, and technology, we create opportunities for job seekers and companies around the world to find a perfect match, in fair and equitable way. With over 20 brands across 30+ countries, we strive for fair and unbiased hiring.
At our Tech Hub, located near Wilanowska Metro, we are here as more than 300 ambitious specialists who work on the development of our IT products. We are proud to be part of The Stepstone Group, a global expert in job-tech platforms and e-recruiting.
Join our team of 4,000+ employees and be part of reshaping the labour market and becoming the world‚Äôs leading job-tech platform.
additional_module_section:
Our commitment
Equal opportunities are important to us. We believe that diversity and inclusion at The Stepstone Group are critical to our success as a global company, so we want to recruit, develop, and keep the best talent. We encourage applications from everyone, regardless of background, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability status, ethnicity, belief, age, family or parental status, and any other characteristic.

description_block:
LLINFORMATICS
Scroll to company's profile
LLInformatics is an IT consulting company with dozens of satisfied clients across Europe and North America. We serve businesses that expect their challenging projects to be delivered according to plan, with impeccable quality, and under strict compliance requirements. Our remote-first team of 100+ experts specializes in building high-quality digital products. We set a new standard in our industry through data-driven decisions, measurable outcomes, a strategic mindset, and a solid work culture.
additional_module_section:
Our values
COMMITMENT - We are dedicated to our team, and work towards achieving our collective goals. We strive to be a trustworthy partner for our clients and to always do the right thing ‚Äì and do it well.
TRANSPARENCY - We are authentic, honest, and respectful. We aim to build healthy relationships based on trust, direct communication, and common goals with both our colleagues and clients.
OWNERSHIP - We are accountable for the results of our actions. We are a team of individual specialists who trust each other and take responsibility for our collective success, according to our roles.
INITIATIVE - We are proactive in our efforts to achieve a goal or solve a problem. We seek out new ways to do whatever is necessary to get the job done.
CURIOSITY - We are constantly improving and learning new things. We stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends. We provide a flexible and practical approach to project requirements. We share our knowledge and keep an open mind.
FELLOWSHIP - We build strong relationships with our colleagues and clients. We create a positive environment where everyone feels comfortable and valued. We keep in mind the feelings of others and support our colleagues in difficult situations.

SQUARE ONE RESOURCES sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
At Square One Poland we link IT experts with the business. With over 25 years of experience, we specialize in recruitment processes on a global scale. Despite years of experience, we still have a startup DNA and this is our advantage. Our offices are located in London and Warsaw, however, we can reach clients from all over the world, from start-ups to big worldwide corporations.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Join our team at Home Connect and play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our cutting-edge IoT platform. As a FullStack TypeScript Developer, you‚Äôll leverage your full-stack expertise to build scalable, high-performance solutions within our microservices architecture.
Build & Optimize: Design, develop, and optimize scalable, maintainable, and secure applications that enhance the connected home experience, focusing on user-centric solutions.
Architect & Integrate: Develop and integrate robust APIs and microservices, ensuring seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.
Drive Code Excellence: Uphold high standards of code quality through rigorous testing, including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests, and participate in thorough code reviews.
Collaborate & Innovate: Partner closely with cross-functional teams‚Äîproduct managers, UX designers, and fellow engineers‚Äîto deliver exceptional, intuitive user experiences.
Embrace Agile: Actively participate in Agile workflows, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, and demos, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
Shape the Future: Contribute to continuous improvement by refining development processes and staying ahead of industry trends in IoT and smart home technologies.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Experience: 4+ years of hands-on experience as a Full Stack Engineer or similar role, with a strong focus on TypeScript, React (Next.js), and Node.js
React Mastery: Deep expertise in React, including advanced concepts like state management, performance optimization, and server-side rendering
Next.js Proficiency: Strong practical experience with server-rendered React applications using Next.js
TypeScript Expertise: Advanced proficiency in TypeScript, ensuring type-safe and maintainable applications
Node.js Strength: Solid experience in building backend applications with Node.js
API Development: Extensive experience working with RESTful APIs and integrating with complex backend systems
Testing Excellence: Hands-on experience with modern testing frameworks such as Jest, Vitest, Playwright, and React Testing Library
Microservices Knowledge: Understanding of microservices architecture and best practices
Architectural Understanding: Ability to design and implement complex, scalable, and maintainable systems, considering security and performance
Database Skills: Experience working with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB)
Version Control: Proficiency in Git, including branching strategies and collaborative workflows
Agile Development: Experience working in Agile environments (Scrum, Kanban) with tools like Jira, Confluence
Communication & Collaboration: Strong interpersonal skills with professional-level English proficiency (verbal and written)
User-Focused Approach: Passion for delivering high-quality, user-centric applications
offered_section:
What we offer
If you are passionate about delivering high-quality, user-centric applications and have a strong background in TypeScript, React, and Node.js, we would love to hear from you. Join us in creating the next generation of connected home experiences.
Contribute to the architectural design of innovative use cases within the Home Connect ecosystem, with a particular focus on guided cooking, while seamlessly incorporating the latest technological advancements
Engaged community of developers and knowledge sharing events (e.g. Techdays)
Stable employment in a professional and collaborative work environment
Flexible working hours, with the option for remote work on selected days
Comprehensive benefits package, including private health care, Lunchpass card, sport card, group insurance options, and fresh fruit offerings

description_block:
CONSCENSIA POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Conscensia ‚Äì a Danish software development company with headquarters in Aalborg (Denmark) and development centers in Lviv (Ukraine), Warsaw (Poland) and in Porto (Portugal). Today the company has more than 18 years of experience in helping companies to create the best software solutions for their businesses.
At Conscensia, you‚Äôll have the unique opportunity to work as part of our team while contributing to innovative projects for our trusted clients. This position is for a project with Frey Commodities, where you‚Äôll collaborate closely with the customer‚Äôs team while enjoying all the benefits and support of being a Conscensia colleague
additional_module_section:
About Frey (The Customer):
We optimise containerized agricultural commodity flows by unifying diverse global expertise and backgrounds with an ambition for growth and a strong belief in simple, digital, and transparent trading of commodities providing affordable possibilities for any kind of business. We are entrepreneurs with advanced expertise in trading, logistics, and data that utilise technology and great minds to connect local businesses with suppliers across the globe, enabling new access and opportunity to markets, materials, and products. In short, we make commodity trading easy, efficient, and affordable. By living our values of being Trustworthy, Rethinking, Ambitious, Data-driven, and Entrepreneurial, we rethink commodity trading and logistics and build a culture of empowering our employees to challenge the status quo and make a smarter move.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You‚Äôll be using state-of-the-art AI technologies to build intelligent and innovative solutions.
You‚Äôll be developing and implementing high-quality applications that integrate AI, Generative AI, and LLMs (Large Language Models).
You‚Äôll own your work, influencing the project‚Äôs architecture, strategy, and AI-driven features.
You‚Äôll have the freedom to experiment and improve the product by leveraging OpenAI API, different LLM models, and chatbot frameworks.
You‚Äôll be joining a team of customer-focused Full Stack Engineers and UX/UI designers, driving one of the most exciting AI-powered products on the Polish IT market.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
At least 3 years of programming experience (Senior Level: 5+ years).
Strong knowledge of JavaScript or TypeScript (Senior Level: very good knowledge of both).
Experience with JS frameworks (we use Express.js and React).
Hands-on experience in integrating AI/GenAI models into applications (e.g., OpenAI API, LangChain, Hugging Face, or other LLM providers).
Experience in building AI-powered chatbots or virtual assistants.
Knowledge of RESTful API design using best practices and design patterns.
Understanding of asynchronous programming and experience with message brokers (RabbitMQ, Redis).
Ability to write clean, testable, and scalable code.
Experience in Agile and Scrum methodologies (we work in Scrum, by the way).
Strong collaboration skills, working closely with business stakeholders and AI/ML teams.
(For Senior Level) Ability to take ownership, driving AI-enhanced services from concept to deployment.
Optional
Hands-on experience with microservices architecture.
Experience working with LLMOps/MLOps pipelines for AI model deployment and monitoring.
Knowledge of relational and non-relational databases.
DevOps skills, including Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, and Ansible.
Experience with vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate) for AI-powered search and recommendation systems.
Enthusiastic approach to coffee breaks and informal discussions‚Äîwe believe great ideas come from relaxed conversations!

Beesafe Sp. z o.o.

A company founded in 2020 to revolutionize the insurance market in Europe and create one of the most innovative insurance products in Central Eastern Europe. We felt proud that it was Poland to start the revolution!
Since then, we have developed a lot. Now we have several dozen people on board - some work from our office in Warsaw, some remotely. We do our best to be as elastic as possible.
We have an agile mindset so that we can transform our product quickly, and at the same time, we are a stable place to work, as we belong to Vienna Insurance Group, the leading insurance corporate group in Central-Eastern Europe. Do you know Compensa, our major company in Poland?

description_block:
ZOOLA TECH POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Zoolatech is a Software development company. Now we have around 400 team members in Ukraine, Mexico, Turkey, Poland and we continue to grow.
Zoolatech was founded on the idea of creating a harmonious, collaborative environment for all of our team members and our clients that, once they have discovered it, they will never want to leave. We are building a family-like atmosphere where clients and team members act as partners and share common goals.
Our clients are awesome people who like what they do, so we work hard to make their products incredible. We help them achieve their desires and dreams.
We work with big enterprises and small startups from the USA and Europe. Our customers make the world better in many areas: Retail, Media & Entertainment, Logistics, FinTech, Renewable Energy, Healthcare, Agriculture, Construction & Real Estate, Travel & Hospitality and High Tech.
Mission: Our mission is to create an environment of professionalism and friendliness that will provide an excellent working environment for employees and outstanding service for the clients.
At Zoolatech, everyone creates their own story: it can be about complex architecture, sports, a full and healthy life, or something completely new and exciting that you will bring to us and unite others around it.
We have values that our employees and clients share:
Extreme Ownership
- We own everything within our reach: our work, our results, our relations with coworkers and clients, our careers and professional growth
- We don't blame others and circumstances
- We face challenges, and we‚Äôre not hesitant to ask for help when needed
Learn from Failure
- We love learning and dare to try making things differently and better
- We are smart not to make the same mistake for the second time
- We prefer taking risks and actions to staying still
Speak Up
- We care for what is going on within our reach
- We know we are empowered to make a change
- We do not pretend nothing happens when we see mediocrity, injustice, or plain indifference
Zoola Clients
- We want our clients to be with us forever
- We religiously believe that the only way to our success is our clients success
- We care about the products we work on, and about people who use it
Live a Full, Healthy Life.
- We measure success by the value delivered, not the time spent working
- We care about our physical and mental health
- We believe that happy and healthy people are more productive.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design, develop, test, and deploy robust backend microservices utilizing your expertise in AWS, event-driven architecture, and serverless technologies.
Collaborate with Architects, Product Owners (POs), and Data Scientists to understand customer needs, translate them into technical requirements for development tasks.
Build and maintain GraphQL APIs.
Leverage your deep knowledge of AWS services and back-end technologies like RabbitMQ, MongoDb and Apollo GraphQL , to optimize performance and scalability.
Actively participate in the creation and implementation of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using CDK or CloudFormation to manage and provision AWS resources.
Contribute to a strong engineering culture through code reviews, knowledge sharing, and collaboration with QA and DevOps teams.
Continuously learn and apply best practices for security, performance optimization, and micro-services architecture.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
3+ years of experience as a Software Engineer with a strong focus on backend development and building highly scalable microservices.
In-depth understanding of AWS services, particularly DynamoDB, Lambda, SQS, EventBridge, AWS IoT, and their application in serverless architecture.
Expert knowledge of GraphQL APIs and their implementation in backend systems.
Strong understanding and experience with Infrastructure as Code tools like CDK or CloudFormation.
Proficiency in Git version control and code review practices.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively across cross-functional teams.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills (minimum C1 level).
Experience with CloudWatch for monitoring and logging.
AWS Certification(s) seen as a bonus.
Optional
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation tools.
Familiarity with containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience with CloudWatch for monitoring and logging.
AWS Certification

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities

description_block:
SIX Global Services
Scroll to company's profile
SIX is a global Swiss company with two strong home markets: Switzerland and Spain. SIX provides technical infrastructure and services to banks and other international financial institutions. We run the stock exchanges in Zurich and Spain, offer global clearing and settlement services, sell financial information around the world and provide secure payment solutions to clients in Switzerland. In Warsaw SIX combines Swiss working culture with attractive job opportunities in the world of finance and IT. Since we opened our office in Poland in 2017, we are continuously growing and hiring. We offer you wide range of career opportunities in the center of Warsaw in a modern office space close to Rondo Daszy≈Ñskiego.
additional_module_section: Do you have a passion for optimizing procurement processes in a collaborative, global environment? We are seeking a Strategic Procurement Specialist to join our Strategic Procurement team in Warsaw. Working closely with colleagues in Switzerland, Poland, and Spain, you will manage procurement for IT and other goods and services for the SIX Group. Your role will involve international procurement initiatives and strategic collaboration with business stakeholders to drive sourcing success. Be part of a team that values reliability and continuous improvement.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Develop, test, and maintain applications using .NET and C#.
Design and implement scalable, secure, and efficient backend solutions.
Build RESTful APIs and integrate them with front-end applications.
Collaborate with front-end developers and other team members to ensure seamless integration.
Write clean, maintainable, and reusable code following best practices.
Participate in code reviews to maintain high-quality standards.
Troubleshoot and debug application issues.
Optimize application performance and scalability.
Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle, including deployment and maintenance.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Strong proficiency in C# and the .NET framework (.NET Core or .NET 5/6).
Experience with ASP.NET Core for web application development.
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and design patterns.
Proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases such as SQL Server, PostgreSQL, or MySQL.
Familiarity with version control systems, particularly Git.
Knowledge of RESTful API development and integration.
Experience with Entity Framework or Dapper for database operations.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Good communication and teamwork abilities.
Optional
Experience with front-end technologies such as JavaScript, Angular, React, or Vue.js.
Familiarity with containerization tools like Docker and orchestration tools such as Kubernetes.
Knowledge of NoSQL databases such as MongoDB or Redis.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines using tools like Azure DevOps, Jenkins, or GitLab CI/CD.
Knowledge of cloud platforms like Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud Platform.
Familiarity with testing frameworks such as xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest.
Exposure to Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
Experience with Blazor for building interactive web applications.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing robust Power Platform solutions utilizing Model-Driven Apps, Dataverse, Canvas Apps, and related tools. Key duties include creating and customizing Dataverse entities, views, forms, and relationships to meet business requirements, developing and maintaining plugins and custom workflows, and integrating WebResources into applications for customized user interfaces. The role requires close collaboration with business stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements, proposing effective solutions using Power Platform. Additionally, the developer will work alongside functional consultants and project teams to ensure high-quality solutions, optimize performance, and troubleshoot issues related to customizations and integrations while ensuring compliance with company policies and industry standards.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Proven experience in developing solutions with Power Apps, specifically Model-Driven Apps.
Deep understanding of Dataverse (formerly CDS) architecture, schema, and customization capabilities.
Expertise in C#, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS for developing plugins, custom workflows, and Web Resources.
Strong experience with Power Automate for workflow automation and process optimization.
Familiarity with the PowerApps Component Framework (PCF) for building reusable components.
Experience in integrating Power Platform solutions with external systems through APIs, Azure Services, and REST.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment.
Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Fluent English
offered_section:
What we offer
Stable employment. International projects for Global Fortune 500 companies.
Indefinite period contract.
100% remote work. You can choose to work from any place in the world
Flexibility regarding working hours. Autonomy to choose the way you work. We trust you.
Annual Training&Development Budget, upskilling support, capability development programs
Cooperation with top-tier engineers and experts.
Unique TEAL culture, relationship- and respect-driven community, non-corporate atmosphere
Agile approach and no bureaucracy
Outstanding integration trips to various places in Europe for all employees.
Activities to support your well-being and health. Luxmed Gold Extended medical care and Multisport Plus benefit.

BitByBit Sp. z o.o. is a company specializing in advanced IT solutions for the space sector. Our software supports the management and monitoring of space missions, serving as a key component of the ground segment. We collaborate with the European Space Agency, research institutions, and leading entities in the space sector, delivering innovative solutions in data processing, system optimization, and standardization of space mission management.
Due to constant development and new opportunities related to the project, we are looking for passionate software engineers who are willing to work in the space industry.
The European Space Agency, Airbus, Terma, SpaceBel, and OHB are among our clients.
additional_module_section: Interested? Don‚Äôt hesitate and apply, maybe together we will explore the universe!

requirements_section:
Our requirements
Our teams are technology agnostic, always aiming for the latest. We often use a combination of below in our projects:
- Back End: JAVA
- Frameworks: Spring / Spring Boot, Hibernate, MyBatis ORM
- Client-side: ReactJS / Redux, React Native, AngularTools: Atlassian stack, IntelliJ
-CI / CD: Jenkins, TeamCity
-Source Repositories: Bitbucket, GitLab
-Hosted on: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, OpenShift
- Databases: Relational and/or NoSQL. We use Flyway or Liquibase for schema versioning.
- Other: Kafka, Kubernetes, Docker / k8s, ElasticSearch, SOLR, Message brokers
In addition to the right tools, we also encourage teams to follow high personal code/development standards and agile practices (Scrum).
We actively do:
- Code reviews
- Automated testing (unit, integration, e2e)
- Quality control: SonarQube, Checkmarx, FindBugs

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You are about to join a group of talented and savvy JavaScript Developers to build well-designed, user-centered apps for our foreign clients.
You‚Äôre excited about working closely with Product Designers, Backend Developers, Scrum Masters and QAs (they are your new best friends now!).
Developing complex products in an ‚ÄúA-Z manner‚Äù is what you desire (we‚Äôre not code-monkeys!). You are willing to propose outcomes apart from just implementing them.
Agile, scrum & lean startup are not just buzzwords ‚Äì no project managers, a scrum master in every team, and iterative product delivery are standard at Boldare.
Code review and using best practices (TDD, BDD etc.) are the habits you cannot live without.
Self-organization ‚Äì there are no managers in Boldare, so the teams organize their work by themselves. You‚Äôll be engaged in building the product roadmap, sprint planning, etc.
Direct impact on the product & tech stack ‚Äì our scrum teams are responsible not only for performing tasks but also for proposing technical solutions. You‚Äôre the expert here, so we trust in your tech recommendations.
Clients are partners ‚Äì we really care about our relationships with them, and we cooperate as equal partners. There will be no proxies in between your team and the client. Forget about waiting ages for the answer to a simple question - you can expect clear and direct communications.
Face-to-face meetings with clients and the team (which are highly valuable for us). Regular business trips are standard at Boldare. With some partners we meet once a month, with others every six months. The frequency varies, but we care for all team members to participate in onsite meetings.
Transparency and feedback. We always share the results of our work and give each other feedback. Everybody here has full access to data (including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data). Also, we communicate via open channels to effectively spread information.
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
2+ years of experience in developing JS applications using Vue.js and React
Commercial experience with Vue 2 and Composition API
Practice in Typescript
Proficient understanding of Git
Strong knowledge of REST API design
Experience with Vuetify
Knowledge of Agile development methodologies (Scrum preferably)
Experience with direct cooperation with external client
Command of English and Polish on B2+ level
Openness to business trips and face-to-face meetings with the team
Optional
Practical experience with Next
Experience with Jest
Experience with Pinia
offered_section:
What we offer
Joining #BoldareTeam, which is a community of open-minded product builders, eager to share their knowledge and best practices
Gaining practical experience and growing in the areas of project management
Dynamic environment where every day brings something new
Chance to work on diverse projects that will help you grow
Real impact on decisions made inside the organization (it‚Äôs not an empty offer, you‚Äôve got it!)
Cooperating with different roles and teams, and possibility to learn from them
Regular feedback and soft skills development
Possibility of receiving a permanent job proposal after internship
A lot of internal & external initiatives where employees share their knowledge and best practices
Biannual Company Celebrations: twice a year, we bring everyone together for a company-wide event. It‚Äôs a great opportunity to unwind and have fun with your coworkers
Anniversary Celebrations: we‚Äôre grateful to have you with us, and we make sure to celebrate every year you‚Äôre here. Reach the 10-year milestone, and you‚Äôll receive a special gift to mark the occasion
Pet-Friendly Office: love bringing your furry friend to work? Our office is pet-friendly, so your four-legged companion is always welcome
Tech Choice: you can choose between a MacBook or a Lenovo laptop, depending on your preference
Flexible working hours (but there are determined core hours)
Great atmosphere and teamwork based on various ways of working face-to-face. Caring for our bold bond, we‚Äôre meeting regularly to spend time together in real life. At online meetings we always have webcams on and find some space for pleasant chitchats
The possibility of hybrid mode. You can work from home, but still, our teams meet regularly at Boldare office and we will need you in the office once a week
Variety of working arrangements (e.g., employment contract/B2B contract, mandate contract)
Preferential terms of Multisport & Lux Med cards
description_block:
Boldare
Scroll to company's profile
Boldare is an Agile-powered company with nearly two decades of international experience in product development and consulting. The company helps clients redefine their industries by building with them the products their users want. Starting in 2004, Boldare now has talents spread across Europe. They have built over 300 digital products for clients around the globe ‚Äì Western and North Europe, the United Kingdom, North America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Australia.
additional_module_section:
What does working in Boldare taste like?
Feedback always & everywhere - We are always ready and open to share our thoughts! We do it in our daily work, workshops, 1:1 sessions, etc. This is one of the best tools in our professional growth. We also often share feedback in a team forum, because it‚Äôs great to learn from each other‚Äôs experiences.
Transparency in our DNA - EVERYBODY in Boldare has full access to data, including knowledge bases, project descriptions, metrics, statistics, strategies, even financial data, etc. We almost always communicate with each other via open channels to effectively spread information. This is what you need to make conscious, independent decisions in your role

description_block:
CONSCENSIA POLAND sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Conscensia ‚Äì a Danish software development company with headquarters in Aalborg (Denmark) and development centers in Lviv (Ukraine), Warsaw (Poland) and in Porto (Portugal). Today the company has more than 18 years of experience in helping companies to create the best software solutions for their businesses.
At Conscensia, you‚Äôll have the unique opportunity to work as part of our team while contributing to innovative projects for our trusted clients. This position is for a project with Frey Commodities, where you‚Äôll collaborate closely with the customer‚Äôs team while enjoying all the benefits and support of being a Conscensia colleague
additional_module_section:
About Frey (The Customer):
We optimise containerized agricultural commodity flows by unifying diverse global expertise and backgrounds with an ambition for growth and a strong belief in simple, digital, and transparent trading of commodities providing affordable possibilities for any kind of business. We are entrepreneurs with advanced expertise in trading, logistics, and data that utilise technology and great minds to connect local businesses with suppliers across the globe, enabling new access and opportunity to markets, materials, and products. In short, we make commodity trading easy, efficient, and affordable. By living our values of being Trustworthy, Rethinking, Ambitious, Data-driven, and Entrepreneurial, we rethink commodity trading and logistics and build a culture of empowering our employees to challenge the status quo and make a smarter move.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design and oversee data tracking strategies across digital platforms, utilizing Adobe Data Collection (Launch) and Adobe Analytics
Conduct testing, troubleshooting, and optimization of tracking implementations to ensure data accuracy and optimal performance
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to align tracking setups with business goals and provide training on analytics tools
Manage migration of tracking configurations from Google Tag Manager/GA4 to Adobe solutions as required
Perform regular audits to ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and validate the integrity of collected data
requirements_section:
Our requirements
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in web tracking and digital analytics implementation ‚Äì including setup, maintenance, and optimization of tracking solutions across websites and digital platforms
Strong expertise in tag management systems, particularly Adobe Launch (preferred) or Google Tag Manager, with a proven track record of managing complex tagging setups
Fluent English communication skills, both written and spoken ‚Äì essential for effective collaboration with developers, analysts, and business stakeholders
Solid understanding of data Layer architecture and custom event tracking ‚Äì capable of translating business requirements into precise technical specifications and ensuring accurate data collection
Basic proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript ‚Äì sufficient to troubleshoot and test tags using browser developer tools and debuggers (e.g., Adobe Debugger, Tag Assistant)
Residing in Poland required
Fluent Polish required
offered_section:
What we offer
Great Place to Work since 2015 - it‚Äôs thanks to feedback from our workers that we get this special title and constantly implement new ideas
Employment stability - revenue of PLN 2.1BN, no debts, since 2006 on the market
We share the profit with Workers - over PLN 60M has already been allocated for this aim since 2022
Attractive benefits package - private healthcare, benefits cafeteria platform, car discounts and more
Comfortable workplace ‚Äì class A offices or remote work
Dozens of fascinating projects for prestigious brands from all over the world ‚Äì you can change them thanks to Job Changer application
PLN 1 000 000 per year for your ideas - with this amount, we support the passions and voluntary actions of our workers
Investment in your growth ‚Äì meetups, webinars, training platform and technology blog ‚Äì you choose
Fantastic atmosphere created by all Sii Power People
description_block:
Sii Sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Sii is the leading technology consulting, digital transformation, engineering, and business services vendor in Poland. We already employ more than 7 500 professionals and implement projects in a variety of industries for clients from many countries around the world.
The Great Place to Work title, won 10 times in a row, proves that at Sii we create a friendly work environment. In a survey, as many as 90% of our employees responded that Sii is a great place to work, and 95% of them think we have a great atmosphere here.
additional_module_section:
Job Description
We are looking for a skilled and hands-on Digital Web Tracking Implementation Specialist to join our team and deliver exceptional solutions for our clients. This role involves managing end-to-end tracking implementation across digital platforms, with a focus on planning, configuring, and testing technical implementations and architectures. Expertise in Adobe Data Collection (Launch) and Adobe Analytics is highly preferred. Experience with Google tools (GTM, GA4) is also welcome, provided the candidate is open to transitioning to our Adobe tool stack.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Design, implement, and maintain API test automation frameworks (REST/GraphQL/ WebSocket) using REST Assured for functional and k6 for performance testing within our Java and JavaScript ecosystem.
Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/GitLab CI), ensuring continuous quality feedback and collaborating with engineers to enhance testability ("shift-left").
Troubleshoot application issues identified during testing within our Kubernetes/OpenShift environments and contribute to system/integration testing, including setting up mocks.
Conduct exploratory testing to identify potential issues and continuously improve testing processes, tools, and overall strategy.
Collaborate closely with developers, product owners, and other stakeholders in an Agile environment to ensure high-quality deliveries.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Proven experience developing test automation solutions using Java and JavaScript, with solid hands-on expertise in REST Assured and k6 for API functional and performance testing.
Practical experience with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins and/or GitLab CI), version control (Git), and testing applications deployed in containerized environments (Kubernetes/OpenShift).
Strong understanding of testing methodologies such as system/integration, mocking, and exploratory testing. Familiarity with BDD concepts (e.g., Gherkin) and direct pipeline implementation experience is advantageous.
Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills, a proactive problem-solving mindset, and the ability to work effectively within Agile/Scrum teams.
Exposure to related technologies is beneficial, including Infrastructure as Code (Helm/Helmfile), observability tools (Grafana/Prometheus/ELK), contract testing, or basic security principles.
description_block:
SIX Global Services
Scroll to company's profile
SIX is a global Swiss company with two strong home markets: Switzerland and Spain. SIX provides technical infrastructure and services to banks and other international financial institutions. We run the stock exchanges in Zurich and Spain, offer global clearing and settlement services, sell financial information around the world and provide secure payment solutions to clients in Switzerland. In Warsaw SIX combines Swiss working culture with attractive job opportunities in the world of finance and IT. Since we opened our office in Poland in 2017, we are continuously growing and hiring. We offer you wide range of career opportunities in the center of Warsaw in a modern office space close to Rondo Daszy≈Ñskiego.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
We‚Äôre looking for a mid/senior-level WordPress Developer who‚Äôs ready to go beyond just writing code. In this role, you‚Äôll have a chance to collaborate directly with clients, offer solutions, conduct audits, and improve website performance. This is a vibrant role for someone who enjoys coding, problem-solving, and building strong client relationships.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Ability to deliver projects on time and at a high-quality level.
Ability to work autonomously.
At least 5 years of hands-on experience as a WordPress Developer.
Good verbal and written communication skills in English (at least B2 level) and the ability to communicate directly with clients during online meetings.
Availability for at least 20 hours per week to contribute to our projects.
Strong programming skills and understanding of general principles (DRY, abstraction, KISS, code refactoring, optimization, security, best practices, etc.).
Expert knowledge of WordPress and Codex.
Ability to write WordPress themes and plugins from scratch.
Very good knowledge of WordPress customization.
Very good knowledge of the Advanced Custom Fields plugin.
Good knowledge of WooCommerce.
Ability to create custom Gutenberg blocks.
Writing efficient and reusable code.
Perfect knowledge of PHP and OOP principles.
Excellent knowledge of JavaScript (incl. ES6+).
Perfect knowledge of modern front-end development: HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Web Design. Performance Optimization, Accessibility.
Good knowledge of CSS preprocessors: SCSS is preferred.
Good knowledge of Git version control system and deployment workflows.
Ability to work with the command line.
Pixel precision and a basic aesthetic sense.
Ability to debug complex issues and suggest/implement solutions.
Optional
Experience with ReactJs / NextJs and Headless WordPress is a plus.
Experience with WordPress Full Site Editing is a plus.
Experience with PHP Frameworks like Symfony or Laravel is a plus.
Experience with libraries and frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind is a plus.
Experience with CSS / Javascript animations is a plus.
offered_section:
What we offer
Freelance opportunity: Enjoy the freedom of working on a freelance contract; earn between 25 and 35 USD per hour, depending on your experience and expertise.
Room to grow: We‚Äôll support you in learning new skills and advancing your career.
Make an impact: Your ideas and work will directly influence the company‚Äôs direction and help drive meaningful change.
Diverse projects: Tackle interesting work from startups, agencies, and companies in the US, UK, and Australia.
Work your way: You can choose to work from the comfort of your home, favorite coffee shop, or our Cracow office (with a nice parking space).
Set your schedule: Work hours that suit you best, as long as there‚Äôs some overlap with the team and client.
Transparency: We‚Äôre open and honest about the company‚Äôs decisions, direction, and overall condition, so you‚Äôll always know where things stand.
We‚Äôve got your back: Our team is always there to help each other out. Whether it‚Äôs solving a tricky problem or brainstorming ideas, you‚Äôll never feel stuck and left alone.
Great vibes: Work with open-minded, fun, and collaborative people who know how to keep things light.
Stay connected: Enjoy social events that bring everyone together, both online and in person.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
You will build software, frameworks, and tools required for reliable operations of Box's services across multiple cloud environments.
You will manage the stability and operation of several of Box's most critical production applications through application reviews, capacity planning, and performance tuning
You will be constantly developing automations / frameworks / tools for better platform reliability/availability.
You will collaborate with other engineers on the team as well as cross functionally to foster solid engineering principles and represent our engineering values.
You will participate in various POCs on new projects and frameworks being evaluated for the product/platforms.
You'll grow into a thought leader for how technology can transform operations ‚Äî with support, visibility, and the opportunity to scale your ideas.
You will participate in a team on-call rotation with flexible scheduling options to support work-life balance.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
You have some (1+ year) experience coding in a high-level language (e.g. Python) and are eager to keep growing as a developer.
You enjoy solving technical problems and are motivated to build solutions that are reliable and efficient.
You‚Äôre interested in Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) principles ‚Äî things like automation, monitoring, and performance ‚Äî and are curious to apply them in real systems.
You've worked on simple systems or tools, and you're ready to tackle more complex challenges with guidance and support.
You‚Äôre comfortable using Linux and have done some basic troubleshooting or scripting in that environment.
You‚Äôve had some exposure to cloud technologies (like GCP, AWS, or Kubernetes) ‚Äî maybe through school, internships, or personal projects ‚Äî and you‚Äôre excited to deepen that knowledge.
You‚Äôre familiar with monitoring and logging tools, or you‚Äôre eager to learn how to use tools like Prometheus, ELK, or Splunk to understand system behavior.
You pick up new software, APIs, or frameworks quickly and enjoy learning how things work under the hood.
You‚Äôve experimented with or used DevOps tools such as Terraform, Jenkins, or Argo ‚Äî even if just in a learning environment.
You value team collaboration, communicate well, and are open to feedback and mentorship from more experienced teammates.
Optional
You‚Äôve had some exposure to Java, Scala, PHP, or JavaScript/Node.js, even if not in a production setting.
You enjoy working in a team-first environment, where you support others and aren‚Äôt afraid to ask for help.
You‚Äôre curious about AIOps or how AI/ML models can improve the way infrastructure and operations are managed.
description_block:
Box Poland sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Box is the world‚Äôs leader in Intelligent Content Management. We are trusted by more than 115K organizations around the world today, including nearly 70% of the Fortune 500 and leaders across deeply regulated industries (such as AstraZeneca, JLL, and Nationwide), to protect their data, fuel collaboration, and power critical workflows with secure, enterprise AI.
By joining Box, you will have the unique opportunity to continue driving our platform forward. Content powers how we work. It‚Äôs the billions of files and information flowing across teams, departments, and key business processes every single day: contracts, invoices, employee records, financials, product specs, marketing assets, and more. Our mission is to bring intelligence to the world of content management and empower our customers to completely transform workflows across their organizations. With the combination of AI and enterprise content, the opportunity has never been greater to transform how the world works together and at Box you will be on the front lines of this massive shift.
Founded in 2005, Box is headquartered in Redwood City, CA, and we have offices across the United States, Europe, and Asia.
additional_module_section: Box lives its values, with community and in-person collaboration being a core part of our culture. Boxers are expected to work from their assigned office a minimum of 2 days per week, with a focus on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Your Recruiter will share more about how we work and company culture during the hiring process.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Understand and implement the strategy to establish a strong holistic Experience Management Program.
Collaborate with the CRM team, internal and external stakeholders to enable the CX roadmap. Ensure smooth integration with CRM, CX channels, touchpoints, and tools.
Determine the best customer satisfaction measurements at the right touch points. Select appropriate methods, techniques, and evaluation criteria.
Support the development of the Customer Sentiment program in collaboration with internal stakeholders and external integration parties. Act as a technical expert to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
Advise on and develop state-of-the-art surveys, including clarifying business requirements with stakeholders. Advise on survey design and settings to ensure effective data collection. Organize and manage survey data, ensuring it is correct and confidential. Clean and validate data for high quality. Customize survey questions, formats, and designs.
Support the technical integration of CX touchpoints. Oversee and steer technical implementation partners to ensure successful execution.
Develop dashboards within the CX tool for management. Ensure transparent and stakeholder-oriented communication through effective dashboard design.
Plan and oversee CX projects from inception to completion. Coordinate with various teams to ensure project milestones are met. Monitor project progress and address any issues that arise. Ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Statistics, Market Research, or a related discipline.
Extensive experience with Qualtrics, including survey design, data management, and integration capabilities.
Strong knowledge of Salesforce, including experience with Salesforce integrations and data management.
Proficiency in JavaScript for customizing survey questions and formats.
Experience with APIs and integrating survey data with other systems.
Proven experience in designing and implementing surveys, preferably in a customer experience (CX) context.
Demonstrated experience in integrating survey platforms with CRM systems and other tools.
Profound project management skills, experience in agile working methods and high technical expertise on customer experience processes.
Ability to work independently, cross functionally and in a multi-cultural team.
description_block:
ZF Group
Scroll to company's profile
ZF is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.ZF allows vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, ZF offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. ZF electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.

description_block:
CTHINGS.CO sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
At CTHINGS.CO, we're on a mission to support the digital transformation of industries and municipalities. We design, develop, and manufacture 5G IoT hardware, software, sensors, cloud platforms, and web applications that employ bleeding-edge technology and components to monitor, capture, transmit, and analyze data. In addition, we dedicate a lot of our time to creating a robust Orchestration Platform for IoT applications. We're a diverse, multicultural, and inclusive team that is constantly evolving and expanding, and we're looking for a new R&D team member to join us on this exciting journey.

In addition to competitive compensation and standard benefits, you'll receive private healthcare and a Multisport card.

KMD Poland Sp. z o.o.

KMD Poland is the largest foreign-affiliated branch at KMD Group. We are responsible for important solutions and processes in the IT, R&D, Finance, HR, and Support areas. We help Nordic business and the public sector make another major leap in their digital evolution.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Analyse, understand business and technical requirements and work with clients across different domains and industries
Produce high-quality design deliverables that describe how the solution will accommodate business and technical requirements
Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using the best practices and design patterns
Conduct unit and manual testing and deliver high-quality solutions
Identify bottlenecks, bugs and devise solutions to troubleshoot and address issues.
Work in an agile, international environment with experienced and skilled colleagues in Warsaw and Europe
Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner
You will get a chance to work with different programming languages and technologies as those vary from project to project, a large part of our tech stack is Java (Java 11/17/21, Spring/Spring Boot, React, NodeJS, Hibernate)
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Graduate (Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs Degree) of Computer Science or other related numerate discipline
Have at least 1 - 3 years of commercial Java development experience after graduation
Good English skills, both spoken and written
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and data modelling
Familiar with various design, architectural patterns and modern system development
Open towards and able to quickly learn new technologies
offered_section:
What we offer
Scandinavian work environment
Medical Insurance, Life Insurance, Multisport Card
English and Danish language lessons
Drinks, snacks & fruit available at the office
Career development programme for each employee and regular feedback
Internal and external training and certifications
International cooperation with colleagues from Denmark, the Netherlands, Norway, the UK and Vietnam
Attractive office with a view and great location in Warsaw (Metro Wilanowska)
description_block:
Netcompany Poland sp. z o.o.
Scroll to company's profile
Netcompany was founded in 2000 with the headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark. Today, we are an international company with more than 8200 employees working from over 10 locations. We serve a wide array of customers in their digital transformation journeys in public and private sectors across Europe.
We are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. At Netcompany we rely on one another and we develop quickly. We are team players. We change societies by creating life-changing IT solutions for variety of customers ‚Äì from small private companies to large projects in the public sector. Our culture builds on low bureaucracy with a strong focus on high agility and flexibility.
Our culture emphasizes minimal bureaucracy. Take a look at some of our impactful projects here: https://netcompany.com/cases/
As we prepare for new ventures, we are seeking ambitious individuals to join us on this journey.
We are excited by the challenge of doing things differently. At Netcompany we rely on one another and we develop quickly. We are team players. We change societies by creating life-changing IT solutions for variety of customers ‚Äì from small private companies to large projects in the public sector. Our culture builds on low bureaucracy with a strong focus on high agility and flexibility.
additional_module_section:
Be a part of an inclusive community
At Netcompany, we prioritise community highly. We actively promote an open and welcoming work culture that is built on collaboration and trust, and where there is always room for mutual sparring and support.
It is part of our culture and values that all employees, irrespective of backgrounds, identities, and experiences, are met with understanding and respect, as well as equal opportunities for development and well-being.
You will have the opportunity to learn and collaborate with colleagues from various cultures and nationalities, as we are an international company with offices in many countries.
We provide a shared environment where we engage with each other across departments and projects. Additionally, we offer a wide range of social and professional events that provide you with the best opportunities to expand and build a network already early in your career.

SIX Global Services
Scroll to company's profile
SIX is a global Swiss company with two strong home markets: Switzerland and Spain. SIX provides technical infrastructure and services to banks and other international financial institutions. We run the stock exchanges in Zurich and Spain, offer global clearing and settlement services, sell financial information around the world and provide secure payment solutions to clients in Switzerland. In Warsaw SIX combines Swiss working culture with attractive job opportunities in the world of finance and IT. Since we opened our office in Poland in 2017, we are continuously growing and hiring. We offer you wide range of career opportunities in the center of Warsaw in a modern office space close to Rondo Daszy≈Ñskiego.

responsibilities_section:
Tw√≥j zakres obowiƒÖzk√≥w
Input/import of payments to the online banking systems, including FX transactions, through banking systems for Ajax Group and affiliated entities.
Verification of payment requests against the approved budget, ensuring compliance with the established policies.
Processing and recording payments, bank statements, and corporate card payments in Comarch ERP Optima, 1C systems/SAP.
Monitoring adherence to budgeted amounts versus actual payments, and performing financial controlling tasks.
Supporting KYC (Know Your Customer) processes, financial monitoring, account openings, issuance of corporate cards, and related tasks.
Assisting the Group Head of Treasury and Chief Accountant in communications with banks, responding to bank requests, and providing necessary comments.
Preparing financial and operational reports related to treasury, including month-end close processes.
Initiation of payment requests related to cash management.
Maintaining and archiving bank statements and other related documents in accordance with company policies and regulatory requirements.
Collaborating in a matrix organization, reporting to multiple supervisors, and coordinating closely with different teams.
Supporting other tasks as assigned by the manager.
requirements_section:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics.
At least 2 years of experience in treasury, accounting, or economics within manufacturing, trading.
Experience in bank statements posting and application of payments to invoices (suppliers and customers)
Proficiency in English at B2 (both spoken and written) to support daily communication in an international environment.
Experience of internet banking systems and financial software Comarch (SAP, 1C - will be advantageous), with the ability to adapt quickly to new platforms.
Strong analytical skills, including the ability to handle large financial datasets, forecast liquidity, and develop recommendations to optimize cash flow.
Proven critical thinking, problem-solving, and proactivity in identifying areas for process enhancement and implementing practical solutions.
High level of self-organization, time management, and multitasking, coupled with the ability to swiftly adapt to rapidly changing operational processes.

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
Participate in further development of microservices-oriented architecture in the context of Home Connect IoT-Platform.
Participate in the selection of proper and well-suited technologies for the project (your voice matters).
Continuously work on optimizing the code to achieve a solid software architecture.
Collaborate with team by focusing on delivering value for users.
Create, enhance and maintain automated Unit- and Integration tests.
Analyze software problems and work on bug fixes.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
3+ years of experience in software development focused on TypeScript tech-stack (as backend- or full stack-developer).
Extensive experience in building backend applications with Node.js.
Extensive experience working with RESTful APIs and integrating with complex backend systems.
Understanding of microservice architecture and ability to implement its best practices.
Be open-minded and flexible in usage of technologies - the project also uses Kotlin/SpringBoot microservices.
Experience in working with relational databases (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB).
Managing code repositories (like Github), handling Pull Requests, collaborating on code versions.
Experience in working with cloud solutions (AWS).
Know-how of methods and tools for automated testing (Unit-/UI-Testing).
Agile development, supported by practices (Scrum, Kanban) and related tools.
Comfortable in working with English - verbal and written communication skills.
Open to work on tasks not directly about coding new features, such as research, testing, feedback the UX design etc.
Proactive posture ‚Äì active in finding topics to work on, willingness to find and work on improvements.
Focused on user value.
Team player and open for effective remote cooperation (distributed team).
Optional
Experience using Java/Kotlin.
Experience using Spring (Boot).
Development of skills for Amazon Alexa or other voice-based integrations.
Experience in smart home solutions.
Experience in event-driven architecture - Apache Kafka or similar.
Knowledge of CI/CD (especially Artifactory, Bitbucket, Jenkins), project management tools (Confluence, JIRA), mobile app development.
Experience with building front-end solutions, React.
Strong communication skills including ability to present results in front of a bigger audience (sprint review, system demo).
German or other foreign language would be a big plus.
offered_section:
What we offer
Participate in the concept creation and software architecture for new use cases of Home Connect Ecosystem with big focus on voice assistant integration
Stable employment and professional work environment
Flexible working hours, remote work on selected days
Benefit package (private health care, Lunchpass card, sport card, group insurance possibility, daily fruits)

responsibilities_section:
Your responsibilities
SEO Strategy and Execution:
- Develop and execute effective SEO strategies tailored to the organization‚Äôs objectives and audience.
- Optimize website structure, metadata, and content to maximize search engine visibility.
Keyword Research and Content Optimization:
- Conduct keyword research to identify high-impact opportunities for content creation and optimization.
- Collaborate with content teams to create SEO-friendly content tailored for Turkish-speaking audiences.
Technical SEO:
- Audit and improve website performance, focusing on technical elements such as page speed, mobile responsiveness, and crawlability.
- Collaborate with developers to implement SEO best practices (e.g., structured data, XML sitemaps).
Link-Building and Outreach:
- Develop ethical link-building strategies to enhance domain authority.
- Monitor backlink profiles and ensure compliance with search engine guidelines.
Market Localization:
- Adapt SEO strategies to the Turkish market by incorporating cultural and linguistic nuances.
- Monitor local search engine behavior (e.g., Yandex, Google T√ºrkiye) to improve performance.
Analytics and Reporting:
- Track and report on key SEO performance metrics, including traffic, rankings, conversions, and ROI.
- Use tools like Google Analytics, Search Console, and SEMrush to derive actionable insights.
Adaptation and Innovation:
- Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO tools, search engine algorithm updates, and best practices.
- Proactively adjust strategies based on trends and competitor activity.
requirements_section:
Our requirements
Language: Fluency in Turkish is mandatory; English is a plus.
Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Communications, Computer Science, or related fields, or equivalent experience.
Experience:
Minimum 1-2 years of SEO experience
Skills:
- Strong understanding of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO.
- Experience with SEO tools (Google Analytics, Search Console, SEMrush, etc.).
- Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Soft Skills:
- Analytical mindset with problem-solving abilities.
- Excellent communication and teamwork.
- Results-oriented and proactive approach.
